mapper.select: select * from (select TO_CHAR(PYNM_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as PYNM_DT , sum(PYNM_TOTAL_AMT) as PYNM_TOTAL_AMT from PAYMENT where FRCS_NO = ${crrFrcsNo} group by TO_CHAR(PYNM_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') order by PYNM_DT desc) where ROWNUM <= 7

select p.PRDCT_NM, fi.FRCS_INVEN_CNT, (fi.FRCS_INVEN_PROPER_CNT - fi.FRCS_INVEN_CNT) as insufficientCnt from FRCS_INVENTORY fi, PRODUCT p where fi.PRDCT_NO = p.PRDCT_NO and FRCS_NO = ${crrFrcsNo} and (FRCS_INVEN_CNT-FRCS_INVEN_PROPER_CNT) < 0 and PRDCT_DSCN_YN = 'N'

select payment.paycnt, payment.paytotalAmt, frcs_order.ordercnt, offdoc.offdoccnt from (select count(*) as paycnt, nvl(sum(PYNM_TOTAL_AMT), 0) as paytotalAmt from PAYMENT where FRCS_NO=${crrFrcsNo} and TRUNC(PYNM_DT) = TRUNC(sysdate)) payment, (select count(*) as ordercnt from FRCS_ORDER where FRCS_NO=${crrFrcsNo} and FRCS_ORDER_TYPE_CD = 'FODST01') frcs_order, (select count(*) as offdoccnt from OFFICIAL_DOCUMENT where OFF_DOC_TO = ${crrFrcsNo} and OFF_DOC_STATUS_YN = 'N') offdoc
